description: This file declares functions and includes necessary headers for handling Zigbee events within the Zilker SDK. It provides initialization, system readiness, and discovery status functions related to Zigbee event handling.

methods.name: zigbeeEventHandlerInit
methods.description: Initializes the Zigbee event handler with callback functions.

methods.name: zigbeeEventHandlerSystemReady
methods.description: Signals that the system is ready for Zigbee event processing.

methods.name: zigbeeEventHandlerDiscoveryRunning
methods.description: Notifies the event handler about the start or stop of discovery process.
